remarks: Convert an operation ordering law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-1996.)
statement:
caovord.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
caovord.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
caovord.3 $e |- ( z e. S -> ( x R y <-> ( z F x ) R ( z F y ) ) ) $.
caovord $p |- ( C e. S -> ( A R B <-> ( C F A ) R ( C F B ) ) ) $.
